de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser

Class REST

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jcomparser.REST

  • @Path(value="jcomparser")
public class REST
extends java.lang.Object
    As a part of the JComparser we need to provide a REST API. The REST API provides an Interface to to manage changes or updates in the JEngine Database.

    • Method Detail

      • startComparser

        @POST
@Path(value="launch/{scenarioID}")
public int startComparser(@PathParam(value="scenarioID")
                           int scenarioID)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                          javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        This methods parses a new scenario and saves it to the database.
        Parameters:
        scenarioID - The id of the scenario to be parsed.
        Returns:
        The successCode of the JComparser.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Connection to the server has not been successful.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - The XML could not be parsed.
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - The parsing was not successful.

      • showScenarios

        @GET
@Path(value="scenarios")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showScenarios()
        Fetches a List of all Scenarios and their IDs from the PE-Server.
        Returns:
        A response with a JSON-Map with the scenario names and ids.

      • showModelImage

        @GET
@Path(value="scenarios/{modelID}/image/")
@Produces(value="image/png")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response showModelImage(@PathParam(value="modelID")
                                                         java.lang.String modelID)
        This method fetches the image from the PE-Server and returns it.
        Parameters:
        modelID - The ID of the model to be visualized.
        Returns:
        A Response containing the image.
